column1: Hillary Clinton explains why there is no more important issue than defending reproductive rights

At an event with NARAL Pro-Choice America and NARAL New Hampshire Hillary Clinton reminded the crowd that abortion rights arent only a health issueâ€”theyre also an economic issue, 14, 42
 "All women deserve to have access to the health services and choices they are entitled to" Hillary said
"Yes we want to get the economy working for everybody not just those at the top
We want to get incomes rising
But those of us in this room also know ..
Women cannot succeed if they cant make the most fundamental decisions about their lives families and futures." "Thats why Hillary has been fighting for reproductive rights for decades

She understands that gender inequality has to be addressed in order to take on economic inequality." All of the Republican presidential candidates would defund Planned Parenthood and many have said they will work to overturn
With so much at stake women need a proven fighter in the White House
